subject: Add reverse budget calculator with scenario planning
body:
Implement a comprehensive reverse calculator that allows users to:
- Set revenue targets and timeframes
- Calculate required input variables to hit those targets
- Generate multiple scenarios (recommended, optimistic, conservative)
- View full projections and charts with calculated inputs

Features added:
- Dual calculator modes (forward/reverse) with mode toggle UI
- Reverse solver using binary search algorithm for accurate solutions
- Dynamic constraint inputs for all non-solved variables
- Scenario generator with 3 different assumption sets
- Results display showing solved values, accuracy, and all inputs
- Support for all 20 revenue models
- Validation and error handling

Technical implementation:
- New global state for calculator mode and reverse settings
- Binary search algorithm with 1% tolerance and 50 iteration limit
- Variable bounds based on input definitions and types
- Format helpers for displaying solved values
- Event handlers for mode toggling and model selection
- Dynamic form generation for constraints

Documentation:
- Updated README with reverse calculator usage guide
- Added example use cases and step-by-step instructions
- Updated project structure and features list
